name: list_pending_reimbursements
description: Lists all reimbursement requests that are currently pending approval or processing, including basic details like employee ID, request date, and total amount.

startDate.description: The start date from which to begin listing pending reimbursements, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

endDate.description: The end date until which to list pending reimbursements, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

userID.description: The user ID of the employee whose pending reimbursements you want to list.
